Player History
Drafted in 26th round, 406th overall pick, by Kansas City in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Wendell Cox (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/2015, off Fernando Cantu (BRO)...
Won Gold Glove at Second Base in 2015...
Won Gold Glove at Second Base in 2016...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Released by Kansas City on 10/3/2017...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 3/1/2018 to a minor league contract.
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/15/2019 to a 1-year deal worth $1,250,000 per year...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,250,000 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Philadelphia to Atlanta on 3/2/2020 (Going to ATL: SS Brian Whitley. Going to PHI: SS Adolfo Dinh, P Scott Davies)...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,250,000 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/4/2022 to a 2-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Injured on 6/7/2022 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
